  • <$select index="$scheme$" actions=<> > <$list filter="[[$:/tags/Palette]tagging[]]:filter[get[color-scheme]match[$scheme$]]">

title: $:/plugins/Telumire/Switcher
name: Switcher
description: Switch between dark and light palette
author: Telumire
version-0.0.3: * Added [[meta tag|$:/plugins/Telumire/Switcher/wiki-color-scheme]] to set the color theme to the current palette
